name: EdfaPay, Inc.
description: Developer of a financial platform designed to provide smart and efficient payment services. The company offers mobile software that specializes in executing financial transactions efficiently in the short possible time, least effort & cost, and allows merchants to provide all payment methods for their customers using an NFC system, enabling businesses to collect customer payments through smartphones and completely forgo traditional POS systems.
one_liner: Developer of a financial platform designed to provide smart and efficient payment services. The company offers mobile software that specializes in executing financial transactions efficiently in the short possible time, least effort & cost, and allows merchants to provide all payment methods for their customers using an NFC system, enabling businesses to collect customer payments through smartphones and completely forgo traditional POS systems.
